remarks: Sufficient condition for elementhood in the set of eventually bounded functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)
statement:
elo12r $p |- ( ( ( F : A --> CC /\ A C_ RR ) /\ ( C e. RR /\ M e. RR ) /\ A. x e. A ( C <_ x -> ( abs ` ( F ` x ) ) <_ M ) ) -> F e. O(1) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d F x $.
$d M x $.
